      • getScoreOfLastQuiz

        public int getScoreOfLastQuiz(int user_id)
                       throws java.sql.SQLException
        Gets the score of the last quiz of a user. Note: A User always plays quizzes in a certain order. That's why we don't need to query for a specific kind.
        Parameters:
        user_id - The User who we want a score of.
        Returns:
        Returns an integer of the last points by date for a given user.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
